nodes.text: Star Wars 39 is the thirty-ninth issue of the Marvel comic book series Star Wars. It is to be written by Kieron Gillen and illustrated by Salvador Larroca. It was released on November 22, 2017.

Once the site of great significance to the Jedi, Jedha was left in ruins when the Death Star annihilated the Holy City there. Now, new series writer Kieron Gillen joins artist Salvador Larroca to bring Luke, Leia, Han, and the rest to the remains of the tragic victim of the Empire's fury!
